Lies… Stop lying to people. Cardamom is all over warm counties.. We have it even in the Caribbean. Plus it is a common bush, now you people wanna used it to scam peopel about price hikes!! Lies, Lies… My grandmother used the bush to made tea too not only the seeds for curry.
Wait a minute! That's a spice??? Here in Zimbabwe it grows everywhere, I grew up thinking it was a weed, I had to get rid of the lawn in my front yard because it was growing everywhere 😅 now I know
